graphql.query:
query categories ($slug: String) {
    categories (input: {slug: $slug}) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            name
            description
            slug
            urlPath
            imageUrl
            metaTitle
            metaDescription
            metaKeywords
            position
            status
            displayMode
            parentId
            filterableAttributes {
                id
                adminName
                code
                type
                position
            }
            translations {
                id
                name
                description
                localeId
                locale
            }
            children {
                id
                name
                description
                slug
                urlPath
                imageUrl
                metaTitle
                metaDescription
                metaKeywords
                position
                status
                displayMode
                parentId
            }
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

query category {
    category(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        description
        slug
        urlPath
        imageUrl
        metaTitle
        metaDescription
        metaKeywords
        position
        status
        displayMode
        parentId
        filterableAttributes {
            id
            adminName
            code
            type
            position
        }
        translations {
            id
            name
            description
            localeId
            locale
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation createCategory {
    createCategory(input: {
    	name:"Home Decor"
        locale: "all"
        slug: "home-decor"
        description: "Home decor is inclusive of physical items and objects (furniture, art, and accessories), placement of physical items and objects, and room colors and materials (flooring, wall coverings, window coverings, and ceilings)."
        status: true
        position: 1
        displayMode: "products_and_description"
        parentId: 1
        metaTitle: "Home Decor"
        metaDescription: "Home Decor (Furniture, Accessories)"
        metaKeywords: "Home Decor, Furniture, Accessories"
    	image: "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/05/14/09/sunflowers-3292932_960_720.jpg"
        categoryIconPath: "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/05/14/09/sunflowers-3292932_960_720.jpg"
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        slug
        urlPath
        imageUrl
        categoryIconUrl
        metaTitle
        metaDescription
        metaKeywords
        position
        status
        displayMode
        parentId
        filterableAttributes {
            id
            adminName
            code
            type
            position
        }
        translations {
            id
            name
            description
            localeId
            locale
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation updateCategory {
    updateCategory(id: 2, input: {
        name:"Collection Femme"
        locale: "en"
        slug: "women-cloths"
        description: "Description of the Women Collection"
        status: true
        position: 1
        displayMode: "products_and_description"
        parentId: 1
        metaTitle: "Meta title of Women Collection"
        metaDescription: "Meta description of Women Collection"
        metaKeywords: "Méta-mots-clés Women Collection"
        image: "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/03/09/02/03/girl-2128284_960_720.jpg"
        categoryIconPath: "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/05/14/09/sunflowers-3292932_960_720.jpg"
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        slug
        urlPath
        imageUrl
        categoryIconUrl
        metaTitle
        metaDescription
        metaKeywords
        position
        status
        displayMode
        parentId
        filterableAttributes {
            id
            adminName
            code
            type
            position
        }
        translations {
            id
            name
            description
            localeId
            locale
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

query filterableAttributes {
    filterableAttributes {
		id
        code
        adminName
        type
        position
        isRequired
        isUnique
        validation
        valuePerLocale
        valuePerChannel
        isFilterable
        isConfigurable
        isVisibleOnFront
        isUserDefined
        swatchType
        useInFlat
        isComparable
    }
}

query attribute {
	attribute(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        adminName
        type
        position
        isRequired
        isUnique
        validation
        valuePerLocale
        valuePerChannel
        isFilterable
        isConfigurable
        isVisibleOnFront
        isUserDefined
        swatchType
        useInFlat
        isComparable
        options {
            id
            adminName
            swatchValue
            sortOrder
            attributeId
            attribute {
                id
                adminName
            }
            translations {
                id
                locale
                label
                attributeOptionId
            }
        }
        translations {
            id
            locale
            name
            attributeId
        }
    }
}

query attributeGroup {
	attributeGroup(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        position
        isUserDefined
        attributeFamilyId

            validation

            valuePerChannel
            isFilterable

            isVisibleOnFront
            isUserDefined
            swatchType
            useInFlat
            isComparable
            options {
                id
                adminName
                swatchValue
                sortOrder
                attributeId
                attribute {
                    id
                    adminName
                }
                translations {
                    id
                    locale
                    label
                    attributeOptionId
                }
            }
            translations {
                id
                locale
                name
                attributeId
            }
        }
    }
}

query attributeFamily {
	attributeFamily(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        name
        status
        isUserDefined
        attributeGroups {
            id
            name
            position
            isUserDefined
            attributeFamilyId
            customAttributes {
                id
                code
                adminName
                type
                position
                isRequired
                isUnique
                validation
                valuePerLocale
                valuePerChannel
                isFilterable
                isConfigurable
                isVisibleOnFront
                isUserDefined
                swatchType
                useInFlat
                isComparable
                options {
                    id
                    adminName
                    swatchValue
                    sortOrder
                    attributeId
                    attribute {
                        id
                        adminName
                    }
                    translations {
                        id
                        locale
                        label
                        attributeOptionId
                    }
                }
                translations {
                    id
                    locale
                    name
                    attributeId
                }
            }
        }
        products {
            id
            type
            sku
            parentId
            productFlats {
                id
                name
                status
            }
        }
    }
}

mutation createProduct {
    createProduct(input: {
        type: "configurable"
        attributeFamilyId: 1
        sku: "home-decor-2"
        # use super_attributes and family index in configurable type product only
        superAttributes: [{
            attributeCode: "color"
            values: [1, 2]

            attributeCode: "size"
            values: [6]
        }]
        family: 1

            thumbnail

            cost
            specialPrice
            specialPriceFrom
            specialPriceTo
            weight
            color
            colorLabel
            size
            sizeLabel
            locale
            channel
            productId
            parentId
            minPrice
            maxPrice
            metaTitle
            metaKeywords
            metaDescription
            width
            height
            depth
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        cacheBaseImage {
            smallImageUrl
            mediumImageUrl
            largeImageUrl
            originalImageUrl
